data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,749 believers in Saint David to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
God, we pray for the believers in Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Chateaubelair
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Chateaubelair, Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,749 believers in Saint David, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.focus_label: Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saint David.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Saint David
location.full_name: Saint David, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
